author: USA TODAY, Adrienne Dunn, USA TODAY
title: Fact check: Trump did host rallies, play golf as as COVID-19 outbreak ramped up
description: A social media post implied that President Donald Trump was golfing or campaigning as the coronavirus spread. We find this to be true.
content:
President Donald Trump golfs at one of his courses. The president hit the links several times between January and March 2020, as the coronavirus pandemic unfolded.
 (Photo: Ian MacNicol, Getty Images)
The claim: Trump held rallies, golfed throughout the sta… [+4230 chars]
